summary:
On a personal level I am open-minded, family oriented, thorough and dependable person. I am friendly and personable, relaxed and easygoing, exhibits poise and have a desire to help others.
On a professional level I have the ability to complete my work in a logical, systematic, creative and accurate manner in order to reach the right solution. I always follow standards, adheres to procedures, calculates risks and weighs all sides of a problem. As a team member, I am loyal and committed to the organization.

profile_positions.description:
I am a part of Philips' Digital Computational Pathology business and am currently working on the second-generation scanner product line.

•	Ensuring suppliers manufacture products according to defined quality standards. 
•	Supporting suppliers during production ramp-up and leading material board meetings with all stakeholders to address issues or faults occurring during production. 
•	Notifying suppliers to conduct root cause analysis if any non-conformities are found. 
•	Supporting suppliers in conducting investigations for root cause analysis. 
•	Analyzing supplier production performance through first pass yield analysis.
profile_positions.title: Supplier Quality Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I was part of IGT (Image guided therapy) business group.

•	Accountable for product industrialization activities like ensuring all manufacturing process related documents example DFM,PFMEA,Control plan available and approved on time with industrialization team.  
•	Ensuring with supply chain team for the availability of new parts in the factory from supplier as per the demand in the project for verification and validation activities.
•	All new parts introduced enriched into busuiness envoirment SAP for ordering.
•	Participation in core team meeting.
•	Month reporting out of the progress to managemnent team.
Selected Accomplishments:
Successfully completed production industrialization activities for the new software release.
profile_positions.title: Product industrialization project manager
Senior Technical Specialist (Manufacturing transfer and New product introduction)

profile_positions.description:
Medtronic is one of the world’s leading medical technology companies and is dedicated to helping healthcare professionals perform their jobs more efficiently while enhancing patient care. The Company offers a diverse array of innovative medical technologies.

Job Title: Manufacturing Engineer II (New Product Introduction)
Currently, I am working in Neuroscience business group in operation function of spine group and responsible for the design transfer deliverables of the new growth project and manufacturing transfer of the sustaining project.

Key Responsibilities and Characteristics:
1.	Leading the operation functional team working for the spine group at Hyderabad R&D Centre.
2.	Design/Manufacturing transfer planning with cross functional team and document signoff in the system.
3.	Review equipment qualification and special process validation protocols-IQ/OQ/PQ and reports of the internal and external manufacturing site.
4.	Review GRR (Gage R&R) reports performed by the manufacturing site as per standard requirement.
5.	Review process capability reports performed by the manufacturing site as per standard requirement.
6.	Tracking the deliverables timeline with the cross functional team that was defined in the transfer plan.
7.	After completion of deliverables, Confirmation with cross functional team on the action items of the transfer plan and document signoff in the system.
8.	Mentoring for the new team joining in operational function and assist them in their onboarding.
Selected Accomplishments:
1.Successfully completed 3 design transfer projects in short span of period after joining and received many appreciations and rewards from local Centre leadership team and global team.2.Successfully done manufacturing transfer project from different off load sites to different onload sites and achieved many dollars saving that was appreciated by the global business unit.3. Working exposure of Windchill and Agile PLM software environment.
profile_positions.title: Neuroscience-Spine (Manufacturing Engineering)

profile_positions.description:
Stryker is one of the world’s leading medical technology companies and is dedicated to helping healthcare professionals perform their jobs more efficiently while enhancing patient care. 
Job Title: Senior Advance operation Engineer (New Product Introduction)
I was working in the operation function of JR business group and responsible for the advance operation deliverables and worked on different design transfer project that included Triathlon project having scope of design transfer of different instruments for the knee joint implant and Triglobe project for Hip joint implant.
Key Responsibilities and Characteristics:
1.	Worked with product development team for the identification of features attribute that are critical for the design function.
2.	Analyzed the feasibilities of the critical features attribute requirement with the manufacturing site and working with product development team on the inputs provided by the manufacturer.
3.	Reviewed equipment qualification and special process validation protocols-IQ/OQ/PQ and reports performed by the manufacturing site as per quality standard requirement.
4.	Reviewed GRR (Gage R&R) reports performed by the manufacturing site as per quality standard requirement.
5.	Reviewed process capability reports performed by the manufacturing site as per quality standard requirement.
Selected Accomplishments:
1.	This was my first assignment with healthcare industry environment and learnt the industry standard and requirement in the short span of time was the accomplishment and it was appreciated by the project manager
2.	Successfully completed project deliverables on time with high quality
profile_positions.title: Advance operation (New Product Introduction)

profile_positions.description:
Federal-Mogul Power train is a leading global supplier of technologies and components in the passenger car, light and heavy-duty commercial and off-highway vehicle markets, and operates in the power generation, aerospace, marine, rail and industrial sectors.
Job Title: Senior Process Engineer 
Key Responsibilities and Characteristics:
1.	Support production by resolving technical issues as required.
2.	Analyses of production line current efficiency and develop improvement plan for the further enhancement of line efficiency. 
3.	Ensure the safe working environment through maintain 5S online and through ensure the availability of all safeguard on machine.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineering- Continous Improvement and NPI

profile_positions.description:
-	Strategical MOB (Make or Buy) decision based on cost effectiveness and design secrecy.
-	DFM review of all in house parts which involve operation like laser cutting, bending, MIG welding, Spot welding, Balancing, Painting, Plastic components and assembly.
-	Investment planning which involve different sizes of (Small, big, medium) welding fixtures, Plastic Mold, Assembly fixtures, Assembly aid, MIG welding set (ESAB, Fronius), Spot welding set (Nash), Welding Robot for MIG and Spot (ABB), Assembly tool like torqueing tool, Plant expansion.
-	Supplier selection and tooling development.
-	Time study and manufacturing cost analyses for inhouse parts.
-	Support routing team in making router in SAP for inhouse parts.
Selected accomplishment
-	Participated in the successful introduction of DOMINATOR 40 machine into the paddy market that based on new technology of straw walker that include feature like high quality fiber roof, High capacity storage tank and heavy-duty cutter bar.
-	Lead the introduction of Crop Tiger 40 M460 machine introduction that based on maize crop into the domestic market that include feature like complex design cutter bar and Feeder.
R&R (reward and recognition): 
1.	Part of team that reduce product cost by 2 lakhs through VAVE workshop (TEAM of the month) – 
August 2016
2.	There was event organized in CLAAS Germany by marketing peoples to take ideas for make promote our products in innovative ways and I had participated in the event and I got second prize globally (Won I pad mini) Jul 2015
3.	There was event organized in CLAAS India for to make write on some topic related to our product and again I have won second position in CLAAS India group.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager (New Product Introduction)

profile_positions.description:
-	Part of New product development team and had responsibility of development production tooling like welding fixture and handling aid for the new model of automotive tubular chassis.
-	Planning and execution of preventive maintenance of productionize welding fixture.
-	Maintain inventory of spares (Location pin and toggle clamps) used for the breakdown resolution.
Selected accomplishment
-	Developed fixtures for the introduction of Indian brand Mahindra-Thar jeep chassis size 3.0X1.5mts from inhouse tool room and reduce the planned capital expenditure.
-	Successfully PPAP submission of Mahindra (SUV) vehicle- VLX model to meet TS16949 requirement.
profile_positions.title: Manufacturing Engineering - NPI

profile_positions.description:

-	Report for the issues and concern observed in the shift.
